summary: During the Korean War former prisoner of war, Major Harry Cargill admits to having collaborated with the enemy but military investigator Colonel William Edwards wants the details.
cast: Richard Widmark|Richard Basehart|Dolores Michaels|June Lockhart|Carl Benton Reid|Martin Balsam|Rip Torn|Khigh Dhiegh|Yale Wexler|Alan Dexter|Manning Ross|Joe Di Reda|James Douglas|Kenneth Alton|Jack Webster|Edward McNally|Karl Malden
title: Labios sellados
